analyzed: phena piṇḍa upamam rūpam vedanā budbuda upamā
marīci sadṛśī saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kadalī nibhāḥ
māyā upamam ca vijñānam
parivrāj kāmu kaśunām ekasyām pramadā tanau

original: kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣya iti tisro vikalpanāḥ // NagBhc_20 ...
analyzed: kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣyaḥ iti tisraḥ vikalpanāḥ
ātma graha nivṛtti artham skandha dhātu ādi deśena
sā api dhvastā mahābhāgaiḥ cittamātra vyavasthayā

original: cittamātram idaṃ sarvam iti yā deśanā muneḥ /
analyzed: cittamātram idam sarvam iti yā deśanā muneḥ
uttrāsa parihāra artham bālānām sā na atattvataḥ
na bodhya bodhaka ākāram cittam dṛṣṭam tathāgataiḥ

original: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhir na vidyate // NagBhc_45
analyzed: yatra boddhā ca bodhyam ca tatra bodhiḥ na vidyate
alakṣaṇam anutpādam asaṃsthitam avāṅmayam

original: ākāśaṃ bodhicittaṃ ca bodhir advayalakṣaṇā // NagBhc_46 ...
analyzed: ākāśam bodhi cittam ca bodhiḥ advaya lakṣaṇā
śūnyatā siṃhanādena trasitāḥ sarva vādinaḥ

original: guḍe madhuratā cāgner uṣṇatvaṃ prakṛtir yathā /
analyzed: guḍe madhura tā ca agneḥ uṣṇa tvam prakṛtiḥ yathā

original: śūnyatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathā prakṛtir iṣyate // NagBhc_57 ...
analyzed: śūnyatā sarva dharmāṇām tathā prakṛtiḥ iṣyate  /
deśanāḥ lokanāthānām sattva āśaya vaśa anugāḥ

original: bhidyante bahudhā loka upāyair bahubhiḥ punaḥ // NagBhc_98
analyzed: bhidyante bahudhā loke upāyaiḥ bahubhiḥ punar
gambhīra uttāna bhedena kva cit vā ubhaya lakṣaṇā
binnā api deśanā bhinnā śūnyatā dvaya lakṣanā
